kunyomiList.definition: god or gods - almost never used by itself. NUBI

jukugoList.components: 神 (GOD kanji) + 様 (important person) = 神様 (god)
神 (GOD kanji) + 道 (street) = 神道 (shinto)
神 (GOD kanji) + 社 (company) = 神社 (shinto shrine)
神 (GOD kanji) + 秘 (secret) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 神秘的 (occult, mystical,)
神 (GOD kanji) + 経 (experience) = 神経 (nerve cell)
神 (GOD kanji) + 聖 (holy) = 神聖 (holy)
裕 (abundant) + 福 (good luck) = 裕福 (financially wealthy with cash.)
副 (side- or vice-) + 作 (make) + 用 (utilize) = 副作用 (side-effect)
副 (side- or vice-) + 社長 (company boss.) = 副社長 (vice-president of a company)
副 (side- or vice-) + 大統領 (President) = 副大統領 (vice-president of a country.)

kunyomiList.definition: width
to be rich in XXX (i.e. This region is rich in timber. Tofu is rich in calcium.. . . .but not actual money usually)
wealth (oddly, this one DOES refer to cash wealth)

jukugoList.components: 富 (get rich) + 士 (samurai radical) + 山 (mountain) = 富士山 (Mt. Fuji)
豊 (plentiful) + 富 (get rich) = 豊富 (rich in xxx)
失 (miss out on) + 礼 (polite) = 失礼 (rude)
礼 (polite) + 儀 (politeness) = 礼儀 (Formal manners)
礼 (polite) + 金 (gold) = 礼金 (key money)

kunyomiList.definition: I mess shit up so it is disorderly
to be chaotic, to become disordered and messy

jukugoList.components: 乱 (disorder) + 暴 (rampage) = 乱暴 (violent)
混 (mix) + 乱 (disorder) = 混乱 (confusion)

kunyomiList.definition: a label, nametag, small sign, etc.

jukugoList.components: 千 (thousand) + 円 (yen/circle) + 札 (card / label / bill) = 千円札 (1,000 yen bill)

kunyomiList.definition: baby-talk for titties. KANAKIDS

jukugoList.components: 牛 (cow) + 乳 (milk) = 牛乳 (cow's milk)
乳 (milk) + 首 (neck) = 乳首 (nipple)
巨 (giant super huge) + 乳 (milk) = 巨乳 (tig ole biddies)

kunyomiList.definition: at the beginning
did xxx for the first time ever

jukugoList.components: 最 (most) + 初 (first time) = 最初 (first of all. . .)
最 (most) + 初 (first time) = 最初の (at first)

kunyomiList.definition: naked

jukugoList.components: 全 (all) + 裸 (naked) = 全裸 (totally nude)
半 (half) + 裸 (naked) = 半裸 (half nude)
被 (get injured) + 害 (damage) = 被害 (casualties)
被害 (casualties) + 者 (professional) = 被害者 (victim)
被害 (casualties) + 妄想 (A delusion) = 被害妄想 (paranoia!)
複 (complicated or compound) + 雑 (miscellaneous , random) = 複雑 (complicated)
複数 (multiple) + 形 (form) = 複数形 (plural)
複 (complicated or compound) + 数 (integer, to count) = 複数 (multiple)

kunyomiList.definition: entrails!
kunyomiList.stars: The kunyomi of his one is tricky because if it's written like this:　腹, it's pronounced はら、 but if it's written with the honorary 'お', like this: お腹、 then it's pronounced おなか。 Thus, this kanji is a COCK.

jukugoList.components: 腹 (entrails) + 立 (stand up) = 腹が立つ (get mad )
切 (cut / important) + 腹 (entrails) = 切腹 (seppuku)
復 (return or re-do) + 習 (learn) = 復習 (review )
回 (rotate / times) + 復 (return or re-do) = 回復 (to recover)
往 (depart) + 復 (return or re-do) = 往復 (round trip)

kunyomiList.definition: put on pants or shoes. That's right ； a crazy 1５-stroke kanji for a very basic act.(this must seem absurd to even Japanese because this kanji is usually KANA) KANA

jukugoList.components: 履 (put on pants or shoes) + 歴 (chronicle) + 書 (write) = 履歴書 (one's work resume.)

kunyomiList.definition: valley

jukugoList.components: 谷 (valley) + 間 (a period of time) = 谷間 (cleavage)
渋 (bitter flavor) + 谷 (valley) = 渋谷 (Shibuya)
余 (excess) + 裕 (abundant) = 余裕 (time/room to spare)
裕 (abundant) + 福 (good luck) = 裕福 (financially wealthy with cash.)

kunyomiList.definition: I want it! (kind of a childish way to say it) 1/2 KANAKIDS

jukugoList.components: 欲 (want) + 求 (demand/ask) = 欲求 (personal needs)
性 (sex / essential nature) + 欲 (want) = 性欲 (sex drive)
風 (wind / the flu / style) + 俗 (uncouth) = 風俗 (the hooker biz)
民 (folk) + 俗 (uncouth) = 民俗 (folk)
内 (the inside) + 容 (appearance) = 内容 (contents)
容 (appearance) + 疑 (doubt) + 者 (professional) = 容疑者 (suspect)
容 (appearance) + 姿 (someone's shape, body, form) = 容姿 (one's looks)

kunyomiList.definition: I melt something
something has melted or dissolved.
bathe

jukugoList.components: 浴 (bathe) + 衣 (cloth) = 浴衣 (yukata ； a summer kimono)

kunyomiList.definition: nose

jukugoList.components: 鼻 (nose) + 穴 (hole) = 鼻の穴 (nostril)
鼻 (nose) + 詰 (cram in) = 鼻詰まり (stuffy nose)
鼻 (nose) + 血 (blood) = 鼻血 (nosebleed)

kunyomiList.definition: to bury (literal) / to hush up (figurative)

jukugoList.components: 葬 (mourn) + 式 (ritual) = 葬式 (funeral)
計 (measure) + 算 (calculate) = 計算 (to calculate)
弁 (dialect) + 当 (hit the target) = 弁当 (box lunch)
弁 (dialect) + 護 (defend) + 士 (samurai radical) = 弁護士 (Defense attorney)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( が or に ) のぼ＊る
kunyomiList.definition: ascend. (Planets, moons. People that go to heaven). Also people who take an elevator. Unlike the related word 登る, 昇る implies that there is no effort on the part of the ascending person or thing.

jukugoList.components: 昇 (ascend) + 格 (character, aspect) = 昇格 (promotion at work)

kunyomiList.definition: warn someone to not do something NP

jukugoList.components: 十 (ten) + 戒 (admonish / commandment) = 十戒 (the ten commandments.)
警 (the fuzz) + 戒 (admonish / commandment) = 警戒 (to be vigilant)
機 (machine) + 械 (contraption) = 機械 (machine)
機械 (machine) + 化 (transform) = 機械化 (mechanization )

kunyomiList.definition: feathers

jukugoList.components: 羽 (feathers) + 目 (eye) = 羽目 (predicament)

kunyomiList.definition: 2 meanings: 1) I send something flying. 2) to skip a page, to skip a step in a process, to skip a turn in a game.
it flies

jukugoList.components: 飛 (fly) + 行 (go) + 機 (machine) = 飛行機 (airplane)

jukugoList.definition: jump up from out of nowhere
jukugoList.components: 飛 (fly) + 出 (pull out / hand over) = 飛び出す (jump up from out of nowhere)
飛 (fly) + 躍 (jump) = 飛躍 (a leap)
翌 (the next- / the following -) + 日 (sun, day) = 翌日 (the next day)
翌 (the next- / the following -) + 月 (moon) = 翌月 (the next month )
翌 (the next- / the following -) + 朝 (morning) = 翌朝 (the next morning)

kunyomiList.definition: learn - but not like 'I learned Bob's last name!' Instead of single facts, 習う means to take lessons in something　－ karate, flower arranging. (BOOBOO: not used with math, science, or religion)

jukugoList.components: 練 (practice) + 習 (learn) = 練習 (practice)
復 (return or re-do) + 習 (learn) = 復習 (review )
習 (learn) + 慣 (adapt) = 習慣 (custom)

kunyomiList.definition: weak

jukugoList.components: 弱 (weak) + 虫 (insizzect) = 弱虫 (weakling)
軟 (soft) + 弱 (weak) = 軟弱 (feeble)
弱 (weak) + 点 (point) = 弱点 (achilles heel)

kunyomiList.definition: to fan one's self (with a fan or one's hand) KANA

jukugoList.components: 扇 (traditional fan) + 風 (wind / the flu / style) + 機 (machine) = 扇風機 (electric fan)
扇 (traditional fan) + 子 (child) = 扇子 (traditional paper fan)

kunyomiList.definition: to scatter, but in a GOOD way - seeds, information, sprinkles on a cupcake (also sometimes means, to distract someone's attention, which seems a little arbitrary).
to scatter, in a negative sense: Yo Mama's thong is scattered all over the room! (and half of the adjoining room as well)

jukugoList.components: 散 (scatter) + 歩 (walk) = 散歩 (a stroll)
解 (solve / untie) + 散 (scatter) = 解散 (band breaks up)
展 (exhibit) + 覧 (view) + 会 (big meeting) = 展覧会 (exhibition)
展 (exhibit) + 示 (show) + 会 (big meeting) = 展示会 (trade-show)
発 (launch) + 展 (exhibit) = 発展 (development)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( を or に ) ゆず＊る
kunyomiList.definition: to hand something over (that you don't want to), to concede; to make a concession NP

jukugoList.components: 謙 (modesty) + 譲 (concessions) + 語 (language) = 謙譲語 (humble formal japanese)

kunyomiList.definition: in the distant past

jukugoList.components: 昔 (long ago) + 話 (conversation) = 昔話 (an old tale)

kunyomiList.definition: borrow 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 借 (borrow) + 金 (gold) = 借金 (a debt)

kunyomiList.definition: close! Not as in, "Godzilla is close to Ultraman's size". Close, as in you throw a ball to a little kid and he drops it and you are like 'That was close! Almost!' 1/2 KANA
to regret something, to have a little grudge about it.

jukugoList.components: 戸 (door) + 籍 (family register) = 戸籍 (family register)
国 (country) + 籍 (family register) = 国籍 (citizenship)
入 (put/go in) + 籍 (family register) = 入籍 (enter in the koseki)
黄 (yellow) + 色 (color) = 黄色 (yellow)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( を ) じょう ( さん )
kunyomiList.definition: young lady - a bit formal. Has the nuance of an eligible single daughter of a rich family. A flattering word used when picking up girls. Usually used on women up to 20 years old, but if you're 70 you can use it to a 40 year old single woman. F
side (BOOBOO: not left or right side, that's "gawa". Yoko is like I'm standing beside him, or, she's lying on her side, sideways.)

jukugoList.components: 横 (side / arrogant) + 領 (territory) = 横領 (embezzlement )
横 (side / arrogant) + 着 (wear / arrive) = 横着 (shameless slacking)
横 (side / arrogant) + 顔 (face) = 横顔 (face in profile)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( xxxと ) とも ( に yyy )
kunyomiList.definition: along with, together with

jukugoList.components: 共 (with) + 通 (pass) + 点 (point) = 共通点 (common point)
公 (public) + 共 (with) = 公共 (public)
共 (with) + 産 (childbirth, production of things) + 主義 (- ism) = 共産主義 (communism)
共 (with) + 有 (exist) = 共有 (jointly owned)

kunyomiList.definition: ordinary, average xxx - when ordering food, it means, "I just want this ala carte"
I line things up, put them in order
they're lined up 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 並 (line up / ordinary) + 列 (row) = 並列 (する　 or 　に)
並 (line up / ordinary) + 行 (go) = 並行 (side-by-side; abreast )
普 (normal) + 通 (pass) = 普通 (normal / normally)
普 (normal) + 段 (step / stairs) = 普段 (under normal circumstances)
普 (normal) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 普遍的 (universal)
子 (child) + 供 (follower) = 子供 (child)

jukugoList.definition: when I was but a wee lassie.
jukugoList.components: 子 (child) + 供 (follower) + 頃 (around that time) = 子供の頃 (when I was but a wee lassie.)
供 (follower) + 給 (provide) = 供給 (supply)

kunyomiList.definition: choose

jukugoList.components: 選 (choose) + 手 (hand) = 選手 (pro athlete)
選 (choose) + 択 (select) = 選択 (to choose)
選 (choose) + 挙 (raise / cite/ mention) = 選挙 (an election)
洪 (flood) + 水 (water) = 洪水 (flood)

kunyomiList.definition: literally, it means a street. But it's usually used figuratively: word on the street is. . . . the streets are talking . . . his name rings out on the streets.
harbor

jukugoList.components: 空 (air) + 港 (harbor) = 空港 (airport )
香 (good smell) + 港 (harbor) = 香港 (Hong Kong)

kunyomiList.definition: to differ according to xxx (similar to the ol' xxxによって違います）
use と to emphasize that, one thing is very specifically NOT like xxx.

jukugoList.components: 異 (to differ) + 常 (usual) = 異常 (abnormal)
同 (same) + 音 (sound) + 異 (to differ) + 義 (righteousness) + 語 (language) = 同音異義語 (homonym)
異 (to differ) + 性 (sex / essential nature) = 異性 (the opposite sex)

kunyomiList.definition: a literal wing

jukugoList.components: 左 (left) + 翼 (political wing) = 左翼 (left wing)
右 (right) + 翼 (political wing) = 右翼 (right wing)

kunyomiList.definition: expose some bad thing in public - like a journalist or watchdog group would.
someone or something rampages or rages

jukugoList.components: 暴 (rampage) + 力 (strong) = 暴力 (violence)
乱 (disorder) + 暴 (rampage) = 乱暴 (violent)
暴 (rampage) + 走 (run) + 族 (family) = 暴走族 (Japanese bikers. )
暴力 (violence) + 団 (group) = 暴力団 (the official term for Yakuza. )
爆 (explode) + 発 (launch) = 爆発 (explosion)
爆 (explode) + 弾 (bullet / play guitar / bounce) = 爆弾 (bomb)
爆 (explode) + 笑 (laugh) = 爆笑 (explosive laughter)
自 (my own) + 爆 (explode) = 自爆 (suicide-bomb)

kunyomiList.definition: once again. For the second time

jukugoList.components: 再 (again / once more) + 来月 (next month) = 再来月 (month after next)
再 (again / once more) + 来年 (next year) = 再来年 (year after next.)
再 (again / once more) + 来 (come/future) + 週 (week) = 再来週 (week after next)
再 (again / once more) + 開 (open) = 再開 (re-opening)
再 (again / once more) + 来 (come/future) + 日 (sun, day) = 再来日 (to re-visit japan)
店 (shop) + 舗 (chain store) = 店舗 (branch of chain store)

kunyomiList.definition: to suppliment - like 補充, but the nuance is that you are filling a vacancy. For instance, nutritional suppliment. Substitute teacher. Assist in the completion of something (I helped write the speech). To make up for (i.e. Mitsubishi bank loaned money to Toyota to make up for their shortfall) みつびし銀行はトヨタの赤字補いました。

jukugoList.components: 候 (climate/candidate) + 補 (supplement) = 候補 (candidate)
補 (supplement) + 充 (fill up) = 補充 (suppliment)

kunyomiList.definition: to catch
to catch THE MEANING of something - almost always figurative, in contrast to the more literal, physical つかまる。
to be caught (can both be used to describe an animal being caught by a predator OR someone grabbing someone else by the arm,a crook caught in the act, etc.)

jukugoList.components: 逮 (arrest) + 捕 (capture) = 逮捕 (arrest )

kunyomiList.definition: to get into one's fighting stance, say, when a Samurai challenges one. Nowadays, usually used in the negative: 構えなくてもいい： don't be so nervous. relax. Also sometimes means to pose as , to put on airs. KANA

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( を　・　に ) かま＊う
kunyomiList.definition: to care about, to look after something, to take responsibility for it. 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 結 (bind) + 構 (set up / care about) = 結構 (ok / no thanks / very)
構 (set up / care about) + 造 (produce) = 構造 ( structure)
講 (lecture) + 演 (performance) = 講演 (a non-political speech)
講 (lecture) + 義 (righteousness) = 講義 (college lecture)
購 (subscribe) + 読 (read) = 購読 (to subscribe)
購 (subscribe) + 入 (put/go in) = 購入 (purchasing )

kunyomiList.definition: ditch, gutter, drain

jukugoList.components: 排 (eliminate) + 水 (water) + 溝 (ditch) = 排水溝 (big ditch.)

kunyomiList.definition: get off the bus/ taxi / train
rain falls

jukugoList.components: 降 (descend /rainfall / get out of vehicle ) + 参 (admit defeat / visit) = 降参 (surrender)
降 (descend /rainfall / get out of vehicle ) + 伏 (lay face down) = 降伏 (surrender)

kunyomiList.definition: a year

jukugoList.components: 来 (come/future) + 年 (year) = 来年 (next year)
去 (past tense) + 年 (year) = 去年 (last year)
半 (half) + 年 (year) = 半年 (half a year.)

jukugoList.definition: Oh, No! Please God help meeeeee. . . .:(

jukugoList.components: 少 (a little (amount)) + 年 (year) = 少年 (young boy)
周 (circumference) + 年 (year) = 周年 (XXX-year anniversary)

kunyomiList.definition: 5 things COUNTER

jukugoList.components: 五 (five) + 日 (sun, day) = 五日 (fifth day of month)
五 (five) + 月 (moon) = 五月 (May)

kunyomiList.definition: to tell a story

jukugoList.components: ラ () + ラ () + 語 (language) = フランス語 (French)
英 (heroic) + 語 (language) = 英語 (English)
主 (master/mainly) + 語 (language) = 主語 (subject)
物 (animal / thing) + 語 (language) = 物語 (tale)
同 (same) + 意 (meaning) + 語 (language) = 同意語 (synonym)
同 (same) + 音 (sound) + 異 (to differ) + 義 (righteousness) + 語 (language) = 同音異義語 (homonym)

kunyomiList.definition: to realize　（that someone is following you around / that someone is lying to you), or have a spiritual enlightenment (like Buddha)
nuh-uh! Wrong! It's not like that at all!

jukugoList.components: 間 (a period of time) + 違 (different and therefore wrong) = 間違い (a mistake)
勘 (perception) + 違 (different and therefore wrong) = 勘違い (misunderstanding)
気 (mood) + 違 (different and therefore wrong) = 気違い (fuckin' crazy)

jukugoList.definition: a somewhat formal word for difference
jukugoList.components: 相 (partner) + 違 (different and therefore wrong) = 相違 (a somewhat formal word for difference)

kunyomiList.definition: great, outstanding. As in 'a great painting' or 'a great show.'(p> It also means upper-class. Like 'We can't park in that parking spot - it's for erai people.' A regular doctor is not erai, but the head surgeon of the hospital is erai. That kind of thing.
(literally, "Prestigious, isn't he?") someone who thinks they're all that SARC

jukugoList.components: 偉 (high-powered, prestigious) + 人 (person) = 偉人 (great)
自 (my own) + 衛 (defense) = 自衛 (self-defense)
衛 (defense) + 生 (life / birth) = 衛生 (hygiene)
衛 (defense) + 星 (star) = 衛星 (satellite)
護 (defend) + 衛 (defense) = 護衛 (a bodyguard, an escort)

kunyomiList.definition: to blink, but also to flicker or twinkle。 Usually used as a adjective like, "またたく ほし" (twinkling star)
a wink,a blink 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 瞬 (twinkle / tiny bit of time) + 間 (a period of time) = 瞬間 (an instant)

kunyomiList.definition: to flutter or dance - like leaves in the wind. Not like a person doing the Smurf.

jukugoList.components: 舞 (dance / flutter) + 台 (big thing counter) = 舞台 (the stage.)
歌 (sing) + 舞 (dance / flutter) = 歌舞伎 (kabuki)
見 (look) + 舞 (dance / flutter) = お見舞い (sympathy visit)

kunyomiList.definition: next to- could be the seat next to yours, could be the house next to yours. 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 隣 (neighbor) + 人 (person) = 隣人 (a homey)
無 (without) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 無料 (free)
料 (ingredients / fees) + 理 (reason) = 料理 (cuisine/cooking)
料 (ingredients / fees) + 金 (gold) = 料金 (a fee, also, bills.)
給 (provide) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 給料 (wages)
香 (good smell) + 辛 (spicy / painful) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 香辛料 (spices)
教 (teach) + 科 (science) + 書 (write) = 教科書 (textbook)
科 (science) + 学 (knowledge) = 科学 (science)
科学 (science) + 者 (professional) = 科学者 (scientist)

kunyomiList.definition: a fairly neutral word for 'to scheme or plan': 'The committee plans to raise interest rates.' It can be used for both good and bad schemes.

jukugoList.components: 地 (area) + 図 (diagram/ map) = 地図 (map)
意 (meaning) + 図 (diagram/ map) = 意図 (intention, aim)
図 (diagram/ map) + 面 (front surface / face) = 図面 (blueprint)

kunyomiList.definition: diagonal xxx 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 斜 (diagonal) + 面 (front surface / face) = 斜面 (a slant or slope)
歴 (chronicle) + 史 (history) = 歴史 (history)

kunyomiList.definition: all over again, afresh, furthermore, in addition, besides. NP

jukugoList.components: 今 (now) + 更 (all over again) = 今更 (too late now)
更 (all over again) + 新 (new) = 更新 (renew)

kunyomiList.definition: hardーalmost the same as the OTHER かたい （固）- hard like hard to break. If you want to say someone is stiff or stubborn or anal retentive, you'd have to use 固い, though.

jukugoList.components: 硬 (hard like a rock) + 直 (correct a probem / direct contact) = 硬直した (rigid)

kunyomiList.definition: use (a cement mixer, a video game controller, an AK)

jukugoList.components: 使 (use) + 方 (direction / method / person) = 使い方 (how to use)
使 (use) + 捨 (throw away) = 使い捨て (disposable)
天 (heaven) + 使 (use) = 天使 (angel )

kunyomiList.definition: news or communication from someone - a letter. A simple postcard now and again. Is that so much to ask? Mr. thinks-his-shit-don't-stink???

jukugoList.components: 便 (convenient　/ poop) + 利 (handy) = 便利 (handy, convenient)
不 (un) + 便 (convenient　/ poop) = 不便 (inconvenient)
郵 (mail) + 便 (convenient　/ poop) + 局 (department) = 郵便局 (post office)
排 (eliminate) + 便 (convenient　/ poop) = 排便 (defecate)
小 (small size) + 便 (convenient　/ poop) = 小便 (the wee)

kunyomiList.definition: flesh (never used by itself - you wouldn't tell a hot dude, "nice み!!" as you leer at him. See below for examples.

jukugoList.components: 出 (pull out / hand over) + 身 ((one's own) flesh) = 出身 (a thing from XXX)
身 ((one's own) flesh) + 元 (original) = 身元 (identity)
身 ((one's own) flesh) + 長 (long / boss) = 身長 (height)
中 (middle) + 身 ((one's own) flesh) = 中身 (contents)
身 ((one's own) flesh) + 分 (understand / divide / minute) = 身分 (social status)
